definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (= [[יְבָרֶכְיׇהוּ]] s. Yah blesseth Ges:§ 27, 3) father of a Zechariah in Isaiah's time Is 8:2; usually in abbreviated form as foll.: [[בֶּרֶכְיׇה]]
a Levite gruard of the ark 1Ch 9:16, 1Ch 15:23.
father of Meshullam, one of Nehemian's chiefs Ne 3:4, Ne 3:30, Ne 6:18.
father of the prophet Zechariah Zec 1:1 = [[בֶּרֶכְיׇהוּ]] v:Zec 1:7; [[בֶּרֶכְיׇהוּ]] also
